item.title: Rub(lamp) emote?
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

its in a void or so it checks if you press the first line of the item… when i clicked once when it didn’t exist i got

println_debug("Prayer Usage - ItemID: "+Item);

so that means i got Prayer Usage - ItemID: 2528
my lamp works now with exp and that except for how you get lamp lol i just need emote id to finish the lamp

Read full topic

item.title: Rub(lamp) emote?
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

to your packet handling in client.java add a debug reading…

misc.debug(playerName, “Unhandled packet [”+packetType+", InterFaceId: " +interfaceID+", size="+packetSize+"]: ]"+misc.Hex(inStream.buffer, 1, packetSize)+"[");

something similar to check when you click rub in your game it will print out the emote ID as well in server command line box

nevermind i ment buttonID not emote I see you mean the genie box… with all skills

that would be 5997 I think

Read full topic
